00145 // Georgia Tech Network Simulator - Common Definitions
00146 // George F. Riley.  Georgia Tech, Spring 2002
00147 
00148 #ifndef __common_defs_h__
00149 #define __common_defs_h__
00150 
00151 typedef double         Time_t;         // Simulation time
00152 typedef unsigned long  SimulatorUid_t; // Unique ID for each event
00153 typedef unsigned long  Event_t;        // Idenifies events in handler
00154 typedef unsigned long  HandlerId_t;    // Unique ID for each handler
00155 typedef unsigned long  Count_t;        // For counting things
00156 typedef long           NCount_t;       // For counting things, with negative
00157 typedef double         DCount_t;       // Floating point counts
00158 typedef unsigned long  FId_t;          // For flow identifiers
00159 typedef unsigned long  Size_t;         // For sizes
00160 typedef double         Rate_t;         // Rate (bits/sec)
00161 typedef unsigned long  IPAddr_t;       // IP Address
00162 typedef unsigned long  Mask_t;         // IP Address masks
00163 typedef unsigned long  Proto_t;        // Protocol identifier
00164 typedef unsigned long  Priority_t;     // Priorities
00165 typedef unsigned int   Layer_t;        // Protocol layer number
00166 typedef unsigned long  Version_t;      // Which version of protocol
00167 typedef unsigned long  NodeId_t;       // For identifying nodes
00168 typedef unsigned long  PortId_t;       // Port number
00169 typedef unsigned long  Bitmap_t;       // 32 bit flags
00170 typedef unsigned short Byte_t;         // 8 bit quantity (not really..)
00171 typedef unsigned short Word_t;         // 16 bit quantity
00172 typedef unsigned long  Long_t;         // 32 but quantity
00173 typedef unsigned long  Seq_t;          // Sequence numbers
00174 typedef double         Mult_t;         // Dimensionless multiplier
00175 typedef float          Weight_t;       // Link Cost Weight factor
00176 typedef double         Meters_t;       // Meters for node locations
00177 typedef unsigned long  Dist_t;         // For distances in routing
00178 typedef unsigned long  SystemId_t;     // System identifier for distributed
00179 typedef unsigned long  Color_t;        // For R/G/B components of pixels
00180 typedef double         Angle_t;        // Angles (radians)
00181 typedef double         Joules_t;       // Essentially a 3.6e6 factor to kWhr
00182 typedef unsigned long  MPId_t;         // MPI process identifier
00183 
00184 #define ALLBITS        ((Bitmap_t)0xffffffffl)
00185 #define IPADDR_NONE    ((IPAddr_t)0x0)
00186 #define NO_PORT        ((PortId_t)0x0)
00187 #define MASK_ALL       ((Mask_t)0xffffffffl)
00188 #define MAX_COUNT      ((Count_t)0xffffffffl)
00189 #define NODE_NONE      ((NodeId_t)0xffffffffl)
00190 #define INFINITE_TIME  ((Time_t)1e307)
00191 #define INFINITE_VALUE 1e307
00192 #define SPEED_LIGHT    ((Mult_t)299792458.0)
00193 
00194 #define nil             0
00195 
00196 #define PRECISION       1e-10
00197 
00198 #define GCC_VERSION (__GNUC__ * 10000 + __GNUC_MINOR__ * 100 \
00199                         + __GNUC_PATCHLEVEL__)
00200 
00201 #ifdef WIN32
00202 typedef unsigned __int64 u_int64_t ;
00203 #define bzero(b,len) (memset((b), '\0', (len)), (void) 0)
00204 #endif
00205 #endif
